const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    intervals: {
      my_text: {
        match: {
          query: "hot porridge",
          max_gaps: 10,
          filter: {
            not_containing: {
              match: {
                query: "salty",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
